divs: Sighting DetailsMy cousin (same age within a month,we were abt 8) and I were in the field behind my grammas ( think its Elm st) in the south west corner of Carson City by the Fish creek. We saw a silver shimmery object and thought it was a piece of metal of some kind so we ran toward it. About 50 feet away I stopped and could see it was a disc then but wasn't afraid. It suddenly "jumped" from the ground to the sky and was the apparent size of a coaster, then jumped again and was the size of a dime then again and was a speck then gone. It went up in a zig zag real fast like zip zip zip gone. My mother found a burned circle in the grass. I found out may years later that a family south of town had a UFO come down over their house at night and make the shingles slap up and down. The children saw it but the mother wouldn't look. I can't give you the name ( I know it) because I never talked to them about it. The odd thing is that everything about it is clear except running back. It was summer when we saw it but when I try to remember running home I see my cousin cutting his lip and blood on the snow. Sounds nuts but that's what I remember. My mother says we came back all excited and scared. That's why se looked and found the burned spot.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carson City
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: silver disc about 30 ft wide 15 ft high shimmered like heat waves
